str2: For. A primary particle; properly, assigning a reason.

parse: Interrogative / Indefinite Pronoun - Nominative Feminine Plural
str2: Any one, some one, a certain one or thing. An enclitic indefinite pronoun; some or any person or object.

parse: Verb - Aorist Indicative Passive - 3rd Person Plural
str2: From ek and the base of trope; to deflect, i.e. Turn away.
Behind, after; back, backwards. From the same as opisthen with enclitic of direction; to the back, i.e. Aback.
An adversary, Satan. Of Chaldee origin corresponding to ma'bad; the accuser, i.e. The devil.
